fields.name: url
fields.label: iFrame URL
fields.help_text: Provide a URL for the iFrame that listens to window messages

fields.name: send_everything
fields.label: Send Everything
fields.help_text: Send everything to iframe (if disabled, only context values are sent)

fields.name: context_fields
fields.label: Context Fields (JSON)
fields.help_text: Define which context fields to send to iframe (JSON array format). Supports dot notation for nested properties. Examples: ["wizard", "SelectedAccount", "Account"] or ["SelectedAccount.Name", "SelectedAccount.Id", "wizard.step"]. Leave empty to use defaults.

fields.name: transform_function
fields.label: Transform Function (JavaScript)
fields.help_text: Optional JavaScript function to transform canvas data before sending to iframe. Function receives the full data object and should return the transformed object. Example: (data) => ({ id: data.canvas.id, name: data.canvas.name, accountName: data.canvas.context?.SelectedAccount?.Name }). Leave empty to use default behavior.

fields.name: debug_mode
fields.label: Debug Mode
fields.help_text: Show message queue and iframe status overlay for debugging
